text:
Atrium is a data-driven law firm (LLP) and legal technology services (LTS) organization designed to make access to corporate legal services transparent and price-predictable for everyone. We're doing this by building the first structured data platform for organizational data. We use modern techniques for extracting data that is locked away in legal documents, modeling how best to store this information, and inventing new ways for lawyers and paralegals to interact with the resulting structured data to help advise clients.

Atrium LTS's Founders: Justin Kan (Cofounder of Twitch, Acq. Amazon $1bn), Augie Rakow, Bebe Chueh, Chris Smoak, Nick Cortes
